ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did We not create you from a base fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did We not create you from contemptible water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did We not create you of a mean fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Did We not create you from an insignificant drop of fluid
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did We not create you from an abject fluid?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Did We not create you from a despised water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Did We not create you from contemptible water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did We not create you of a mean water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Did We not create you from a base fluid
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Created We you not of water despicable,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have We not created you from a base fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Have We not created you from a fluid (held) despicable?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Did We not create you from a worthless water (semen, etc.)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did We not create you from a weak water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Did We not create you from an insignificant fluid?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:20] Did We not create you from a base fluid, one that is delicate — and this is semen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Did We not create you) disbelievers (from a base fluid) from a flimsy sperm drop
